website_summaries.verdict: The Vans Slip-On has solidly built a name in the sneaker industry and has been a staple for the Off the Wall brand. It delivers comfort, style, and less hassle with its slip-on feature that is passed on to its variations.With another iteration given to the classic low-top displaying a platform sole, its stylishly fashionable side is taken up a notch. Its versatility, durability, and affordability are also worth mentioning.
pros: The majority of reviewers express that the Vans Slip-On Platform sneaker offers superior comfort for the foot
A good number of buyers agree that the low-top shoe displays a great style
The Vans Slip-On Platform sneaker matches with almost everything in their wardrobe, as what some of the buyers point out
A handful of consumers comment that the shoe doesn’t need a long time for the break-in period
Others have noted that the arch support is commendable, adding that they can comfortably wear them for hours without feeling tired
The low-top shoe is offered in multiple colorways
A lot of the fans praise the checkerboard and monochromatic color of the canvas upper material
Numerous reviewers agree that the Vans Slip-on Platform is a great sneaker option for everyday wear
Several people are glad about the addition of the platform sole as it gives a boost in height
Some wearers comment that the breathable canvas upper makes this slip-on sneaker perfect during the summer months
cons: A couple of users note that the Vans Slip-On Platform gets dirty quickly
Some of the reviewers agree that the platform sole of the sneaker rips off easily, making it fall apart after just a few months of using

customer_reviews.title: I like them, and they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like them, and they are comfortable. Unfortunately, after only wearing them a couple of times they started comed unglued on the sides. It looks pretty bad, not too happy being that they were pretty expensive. Vans are skating shoes, you would think they would last longer than just a couple of uses of walking the dog.
customer_reviews.author: damaris

customer_reviews.title: I find platform Vans more comfy than the regular ones!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of platform Vans. Other platform tennis shoes are almost impossible for me to walk in because I feel like I can't bend my foot. It's like wearing a brick. Vans are different.... the platform isn't overly thick, and I think they're both more flattering and more comfortable that the regular ones. I wear these on long walks, to the zoo, and just about everywhere! I highly recommend them if you like Vans.
customer_reviews.author: S. Perez-Silverman

customer_reviews.title: They can
customer_reviews.text: Never ever disappointed with Vans. I’m almost 60 and still rock these slip ons like nobody’s business. I walk and stand a lot all day and can no longer do”heels”. I wear these with tailored pants and love the look...especially the feel. Good cushioning and the platform adds a little height.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Never want to take them off!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I have had regular slip-on Vans in the past and I think the platform ones are even more comfortable. Note: Van's men's sizes are 1.5 size different than women's, e.g., men's 5 = women's 6.5
customer_reviews.author: anahi

customer_reviews.title: Classic can wear with everything
customer_reviews.text: I also had the platform black color lace ups, with the white stripe, I love both of them but these checkered ones are awesome
customer_reviews.author: LaurenLovesThis

customer_reviews.title: Fits just right came in box
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove these vans so much there what I've been wanting for a long time. There Orginals and I love the platform bottom the shoe fits just right I can't wear socks with these tho as it was hard to put them on so no socks but that's ok summer coming soon. Nothing wrong with them there New and came in van box
customer_reviews.author: MïxedBnaïl'z

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size-full size up
customer_reviews.text: Great, but runs a little small. I usually take a 5.5-6, and these were snug to the point that I stopped wearing them after trying to break them in/stretch them out for a couple of months. Definitely order a half size up, full size if you want to wear them with socks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute with Platform
customer_reviews.text: Love these with the Platform. Very comfortable. Being new, They are tight but do stretch out after wearing them for a day or so. You will definitely need thin socks also.
customer_reviews.author: NLD

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: These just came in the mail for me yesterday, and they are already breaking on the inside. I've only worn them once to work and this is the only time I've worn them. My job is not a heavy duty job, I stand at a register all day. I'm not gonna lie, I've worn a size 7 in Van's for quite some time now the only difference is I don't normally get slip on, but these dont look or fit like Van's. Van's are normally tight for wide footed people but these are seriously killing my feet, more than any other new pairs of Van's I have ever bought. I'm not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Buzar

customer_reviews.title: Vams slip on
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for her wish their were bigger sizes than what was available they run smaller than normal women's sizes
customer_reviews.author: FCG

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I CANT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT THESE SHOES. THEY ARE AWESOME. THEY SENT ME THE WRONG SIZE AT FIRST WHICH WAS A BUMMER, BUT SENT ME THE CORRECT SIZE VERY QUICKLY. THAT WAS THE ONLY REASON FOR THE 4 STARS
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marmon

customer_reviews.title: Platform Vans YAY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the platform style and am pleased with the look and bit of added height. Really works well with capris. They are snug so take that in to consideration. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: becky green

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Vans. So comfortable and able to wear every day. The only issue I had was deciding on the mom size to purchase..I usually wear a size 6, but ended up ordering. 5.5. I would say VANs run a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleLove

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I usually take a size 9 or 9 1/2. Never smaller. I bought these slip on Vans and they were so loose. I wanted to wear without “no show” socks. Way too big. Unfortunately I wore them once so I will give to my niece who wears a 9/2 to 10. Nice enough looking.
customer_reviews.author: Gail E

customer_reviews.title: Fabric pulled away from rubber
customer_reviews.text: I like them the are comfortable. Only complaint is that the fabric is pulling away from the rubber around the sides within 2 months of occasional wear. I still wear them. Not sure I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: lake tahoe laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfort plus!
customer_reviews.text: So comfy and fresh. Slightly snup across top because of my high arch but the thick sole adds so much comfort... I could wear them all day and night..
customer_reviews.author: Bexxy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite Vans! I have the checkered platform ones also and they are both my go to shoes for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever could have bought!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! I got them for my daughter for Christmas. First thing they were dirty! Look like someone had worn them. They even had a funky smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Staple!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a staple in my shoe collection. LOVE LOVE LOVE these Vans! Definitely my favorite of all my Vans. They add an extra element to any simple outfit and are super comfortable to wear! No breaking-in time needed!
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought these platform vans for my sister. She really loves them! They’re so cute and they add some height to her.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable, and Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: They’re really comfortable! Lightweight and easy to walk in. And let’s not forget to mention super cute! I’m usually a size 7 1/2 (7.5) and I went with the regular 7 and the shoes fit great! With still some room in the front for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes!! They fit perfect. I get soooo many compliments when I wear them. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marmon

customer_reviews.title: If it could only look clean after washing it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to keep the white and the black turns gray if you brush it too much. I’ll buy a different color next time
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Vans rock these fit perfect and I love the platform classic black! They were delivered faster than expected too!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Tight across the top of the foot
customer_reviews.text: They were ok but tight across the top of the foot
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kiddo loved them!
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect but I had to send them back for a larger size because I bought the wrong size!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherH.

customer_reviews.title: True to size fit
customer_reviews.text: The fit is true to size. I love this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Minor

customer_reviews.title: These are not as advertised! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were not as advertised. Description states they are leather but they are regular canvas Vans at the leather price. I paid $117 including tax. Now they issued $0.20 for my refund. Very disgusted!
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

customer_reviews.title: Platform vans
customer_reviews.text: All my shoes are platform style vans and this pair is super comfortable and easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah L.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these for this price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wayyy overpriced!!! I found these for $30 on another site right after I bought these. Comfortable shoes, look great with everything, terrible price!! Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Mamashoppa

customer_reviews.title: Irregular sizing
customer_reviews.text: Sizing must be inconsistent. We ordered regular size and they fall off my feet. Now are being charged $8.95 restocking fee and $4.95 return shipping for a product that does not fit. No thank you
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear W7 VANS but Platform W6 fits to me
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is soo happy with these, theyre comfy and look so good
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gehringer

customer_reviews.title: Vans for my 16 year old
customer_reviews.text: She loves these specific vans. It is her second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Sheranian

customer_reviews.title: Came unglued on the sides quickly
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and wish I could bring myself to order a new pair this year. Unfortunately, the platform version comes unglued at the sides pretty early on. I couldn't return them because I had worn them, but Vans should be way better constructed and last way longer.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Jo Taylor

customer_reviews.title: The size it true
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 6 1/2 really needed a 6 but they didn't have any. Just wear them with socks. I loved them so much, couldn't wait.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Takes about a day of wear to feel just right! Not too platform-y either. These are my “go to” slip on’s!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sartain

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these for her birthday and she absolutely loved them. Delivered fast, fit perfect. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: A tad narrow, my sister in law received a pair for Christmas and they seemed to be wide enough. I do love the platform and pattern.
customer_reviews.author: emblazonist@gmail

customer_reviews.title: ... huge for a 6'5 in women's but they fit perfect and came on time love Amazon
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box they looked huge for a 6'5 in women's but they fit perfect and came on time love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: It was fast delivery but I ordered a 9.5 and got a 9 other than that I’m pleased with my shoes
customer_reviews.author: Elicia

customer_reviews.title: A bit snug, but still fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe, on the smaller side still fits though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They’re alright
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, wish I would have gotten them a tad bit bigger. I won’t be getting that much wear out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Teniya Clark

customer_reviews.title: 💙
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little off. But shoes are still awesome
customer_reviews.author: Magnum Mauga

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Classic Slip-On Platform
product_meta.description: Women's Sports Shoes VANS Colour White. Insole Rubber. Outsole Cotton Fabric. Lining Cotton Fabric. Outside Cotton Fabric. Construction Type: Glued. 4 cm. heel. Made in Vietnam.
